name: Digital Forensic Methods
description: Investigative techniques for analyzing digital artifacts and cybercrime evidence.

cards.title: Memory Forensics & Live System Analysis
cards.description: Extracting volatile data from compromised systems for forensic analysis.
bulletpoints: Use tools like Volatility and Rekall for RAM analysis
Identify running processes, network connections, and active malware
Detect and analyze rootkits, trojans, and fileless attacks

cards.title: Log Analysis & Event Correlation
cards.description: Using system logs and event correlation to trace cyber incidents.
bulletpoints: Monitor SIEM platforms for anomaly detection
Correlate logs across endpoints, firewalls, and cloud platforms
Identify exfiltration and unauthorized access patterns
